description: This file contains test cases for the Django template initialization and project setup in the universalinit project. It uses pytest to verify template info extraction, project initialization, post-processing execution, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of project types, including Django.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains initialization commands and info for templates.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides template data for project setup.

classes.name: DjangoTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific to Django projects.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON or YAML file.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for the post-processing script to complete.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Performs project initialization based on the provided configuration.
